gallery.title: DashPad
gallery.copy: React Native App created to make old tablets useful. Displays commute time, weather, time, and upcoming calendar events

gallery.title: Enki
gallery.copy: Expo App created to allow non-programmers to make their own mobile apps. Inspired by SquareSpace

gallery.title: Barry's Beer Fridge
gallery.copy: Website built to track the inventory of my apartment beer fridge.

gallery.title: Did Yandhi Drop Yet?
gallery.copy: Website checks the Itunes API to see if the Kanye West album YANDHI has released

gallery.title: GameHub
gallery.copy: Team Project to develop an e-commerce website. My team built a website for selling video games online.

gallery.title: FeelsGoodMan
gallery.copy: Hackathon project as a student at FullStack Academy. Expo/React Native app built with the intention of simplifying weather data and letting users know if it 'Feels Good Man' or 'Feels Bad Man' outside.
